Class PlayerCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • PlayerCharacter

  • public class PlayerCharacter
extends java.lang.Object
    PlayerCharacter.java A PlayerCharacter (PC) is a knight that is generated and controlled by the player to fight NonPlayerCharacters (NPCs).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerCharacter()
      Automatically generates a PlayerCharacter with all attributes set, including a name

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • attack

        public int attack()
        All characters have the ability to attack and cause damage to another character. The amount of damage is determined by a formula that factors the attackPower of the weapon used.
        Returns:
        The amount of damage caused during the attack

      • defend

        public int defend()
        All characters can defend against attacks from other characters. Depending on the defenseLevel of their armor, they can block a portion of the attack or cause the attacker to miss entirely.
        Returns:
        The amount to reduce the damage caused by an attacker. If the damage is reduced to zero, the attack is a "miss."

      • chooseWeaponInteractively

        public void chooseWeaponInteractively()
        Allows the player to select a weapon, interactively

      • chooseWeaponAutomatically

        public void chooseWeaponAutomatically()
        Selects a random weapon for the player

      • chooseArmorInteractively

        public void chooseArmorInteractively()
        Allows the player to select a armor, interactively

      • chooseArmorAutomatically

        public void chooseArmorAutomatically()
        Selects a random armor type for the player

      • chooseNameAutomatically

        public void chooseNameAutomatically()
        Automatically generate a name for the PlayerCharacter

      • printStats

        public void printStats()
        Print a list of statistics for the character. This is similar to "toString()" except only select fields are returned.
